job.title: Data Scientist, Experimentation
job.description: strongEvolve is a hospitality company with a mission to make renting a vacation home easy for everyone Thanks to an unapologetic passion for hospitality we now support over 15000 properties in over 750 markets across North America We enjoy earning each guest and owners business  all while having some fun along the way brbrstrongstrongWhy this role brbrstrongAs a techenabled disruptor in the vacation rental industry our ability to confidently and quickly learn from experiments across business functions is rapidly becoming an indispensable lever to future growth In this role youd be a key voice in defining the future of experimentation at Evolve tackling the most challenging problems around scalability and statistical robustness and expanding current methodology to learn in new areas of the businessbrbrCome join our fastpaced growthstage culture working alongside other talented data professionals in an environment that invites and necessitates professional growth and learningbrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliDevelop experimentation capabilities to meet growing demand across domainsliliHelp design and prioritize experiments that maximize impact potential liliChallenge the status quo to establish bestinclass practices that augment how we learn from experimentsliliDeepen working relationships with business and engineering teams to lower the barrier to test ideas and build trust in resultsliliEffectively communicate complex and ambiguous information to technical and nontechnical stakeholders liliInnovate on existing strategies by researching and applying techniques from other leading data science teams outside of EvolvebrliulstronguWhat Makes You a Great FitbrustrongulliBachelors degree in Computer Science Statistics or related quantitative field Masters or PhD preferredlili2 years of data science related work liliProgramming experience with Python and SQL ideally in a fullstack machine learning settingliliSoftware development understanding to be able to create highquality reproducible codeliliStrong knowledge of experimental methodologies for working with a long tail of heterogeneous inventory that varies with respect to seasonality market demand and additional attributesliliProven track record of using data science techniques to make a clear business impact and iteratively improving over timeliliExperience working in a collaborative environment and communicating effectively with a variety of stakeholdersliliAn entrepreneurial mentality that can help define product strategy and produces great work with minimal supervisionbrliulstrongLocation brbrstrongEvolve has a flexible working environment so teammates can work remotely anywhere in the state of Colorado in our beautiful downtown Denver office remotely or a hybrid of both Were currently all working remotely and will be opening up the office in the near future for our in office and hybrid optionsbrbrstronguCompensationbrbrustrongFor this role our salary range is 95000 to 115000 depending on relevant experiencebrbrstrongTotal Rewards at EvolvebrbrstrongAt Evolve we care for our teammates by supporting their physical mental and financial wellbeing through a comprehensive Total Rewards ProgrambrulliIndustry competitive pay including equity in the company for all EvolversliliHealth insurance package options that include 100 employer paid HDHP plan and two PPO plan options for you and your dependentsliliEmployerpaid dental and vision for you and your qualified dependents liliPaid life insurance shortterm disability and longterm disability coveragelili401k with a 4 match that vests immediatelyliliPTO sick days and paid Parental LeaveliliRich learning and development program for EvolversbrliulBut wait theres more optional benefits offered include commuter benefits pet insurance and travel perksbrbrstronguAbout UsbrbrustrongOpportunity Our leadership and management teams are dedicated to creating meaningful learning and growth opportunities for all Evolvers as well as providing clear expectations and continuous feedbackbrbrCommunity Its easy to make friends at Evolve We support maintaining a strong community through our teammateled groups focused on learning inclusion environmental wellness and morebrbrTransparency Every month our leadership team shares how the company is performing explaining where were headed next and recognizing team members for jobs well donebrbrValues They mean more to Evolve than just bullets on a page they drive our daily decisions and impact how we work as a hospitality companybrulliEarn ItliliBuild Loyalty One Interaction at a TimeliliCommunicate Often Honestly amp DirectlyliliEmbrace ChangeliliStay Hungry amp HumbleliliCareliliBe EfficientliliTake RisksliliLearn Every DayliliHave Some Fun Along the WaybrliulWhich value sounds the most like youbrbremEvolve is an equal opportunity employer We believe that a diverse work environment is a successful work environment so all qualified candidates will be considered for employment without regard to race color religion gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation national origin genetics disability age or veteran statusem
